category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MRMSetupSheetTemplatesMetric
preference.preference_description: Specifies what metric drawing parts are used as templates to generate setup sheets for resources. Each valid value is defined as a pair of preference entries: the first entry must be a valid Classification class ID; the second entry must be an existing item revision (for example, "MRM_DRW_resources_general_metric/A", where "/A" is the revision ID) which contains the desired setup sheet template part file as a UGPart dataset. There can be any number of pairs. It is possible to specify a parent class for the Classification class ID, in which case the template is inherited to all child classes. It can, however, be overwritten for specific subclasses. Note: This preference defines only the metric template parts. Inch template parts need to be defined using the "MRMSetupSheetTemplatesInch" preference.
